So what's this all about then?...

This is a place to document the things I love and continue to learn about code, not to mention bits of stuff and fluff from my brain inbetween...As for myself I'm Merve - thats 'mer-vay' (its ok, everyone thinks it goes merrrrrrve, unless you too are half Irish Republican and half Turkish???); I'm from London; my sneezes sound like quote:'someone accidentally stepped on a Pokemon', and I love sea slugs.
